text: Ratu Tevita Momoedonu (January 13, 1946 â€“ November 26, 2020) was a Fijian politician. He was the fifth Prime Minister of Fiji twice. His first term of office lasted only on 27 May 2000 for only a few minutes. His second term lasted for two days from 14 to 16 March 2001. He was born in Lautoka, Fiji. He was a member of the Labour Party. Momoedonu died in Lautoka on November 26, 2020 at the age of 74.Ratu Tevita passes away ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Fiji
title: Tevita Momoedonu
